Disabling the Mac OS X Startup Chime

A big complaint about Mac laptops is that pretentious “startup chime” that quickly identifies to everyone within hearing distance that someone nearby has started their Mac. I’ve seen a few solutions that require defaults write but they have never seemed to work for me. I’ve finally found a working solution, and it’s elegant(ish). Continue reading
